content: *three mittens two hearts these valentine s holding hands mittens let you stay close wherever you go shown in patons classic wool patons yarns * skill level intermediate materials patons® classic wool 100 g/3 5 oz 00207 rich red 3 ball s set of four sizes 3 75 mm u s 5 and 4 mm u s 6 double-pointed knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge safety pin right mitten make 1 for her left mitten make 1 for him lover s mitten fits two hands grafting diagram is provided in pdf download january 2010
